private void tssl_连接数据库_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
 {
     try
     {
         if (GlobalVariable.mysql != null && GlobalVariable.mysql.isOpen)
         {
             GlobalVariable.mysql.Close();
         }
         GlobalVariable.mysql._ip = GlobalVariable.CurrentSystemConfig._数据库IP;
         //GlobalVariable.mysql._ip = "172.168.1.165";
           GlobalVariable.mysql._database = GlobalVariable.CurrentSystemConfig.数据库名称;
         //GlobalVariable.mysql._database = "productdata";
         string ErrMsg = string.Empty;
         bool rtn = GlobalVariable.mysql.Connect(out ErrMsg);
         if (rtn)
         {
             MessageBox.Show("数据库连接成功");
         } else
         {
             MessageBox.Show("数据库连接失败" + ErrMsg);
         }
     }catch (Exception ex)
     {

     }

GlobalVariable.cs  public static MysqlHelper mysql;


if (GlobalVariable.CurrentSystemConfig.PG110MES数据上传)
{
    if (!GlobalVariable.mysql.isOpen)
    {
        GlobalVariable.mysql = new MysqlHelper(GlobalVariable.CurrentSystemConfig.数据库名称, GlobalVariable.CurrentSystemConfig.数据库IP, "3306", "root", "root");
        string ErrMsg = string.Empty;
        bool rtn = GlobalVariable.mysql.Connect(out ErrMsg);
        if (!rtn)
        {
            MachineException.CallException(ExceptionType.NormalErr, this._description, "数据库连接失败");
            goto Init;
        }
        else
            goto Init;
    }
    else
    {
        //存储数据   格式 ID S/N, ABI TD2 ResultTD StartTime,EndTime
        InsertHelper insert = new InsertHelper();
        insert.tableName = GlobalVariable.CurrentSystemConfig.PG110MES数据上传表名;
        insert.L_InsertItem = new List<InsertOrUpdateItem>();
        insert.L_InsertItem.Add(new InsertOrUpdateItem("S/N", code));
        insert.L_InsertItem.Add(new InsertOrUpdateItem("ABI", signalNGOK));
        insert.L_InsertItem.Add(new InsertOrUpdateItem("TD2", st_value.ToString()));
        insert.L_InsertItem.Add(new InsertOrUpdateItem("ResultTD", finalResult));
        insert.L_InsertItem.Add(new InsertOrUpdateItem("StartTime", StartTime));
        insert.L_InsertItem.Add(new InsertOrUpdateItem("EndTime", EndTime));
        string ErrMsg = string.Empty;
        bool rtn = GlobalVariable.mysql.Insert(insert, ref ErrMsg);
        if (!rtn)
        {
            MachineException.CallException(ExceptionType.NormalErr, this._description, "PG110结果上传MES失败");
            goto Init;
        }
        MachineException.CallException(ExceptionType.NormalInfo, _description, "点胶结果上传MES成功");

    }

}






public bool CodeJudge(string code, out string ErrMsg)
{
    try
    {
        if (code.Length != GlobalVariable.CurrentProgramConfig.PG110条码长度)
        {
            ErrMsg = "条码长度异常";
            return false;
        }
    re:
        if (!GlobalVariable.CurrentSystemConfig.PG110MES跳站检查)
        {
            if (!GlobalVariable.mysql.isOpen)
            {
                GlobalVariable.mysql = new MysqlHelper(GlobalVariable.CurrentSystemConfig.数据库名称, GlobalVariable.CurrentSystemConfig.数据库IP, "3306", "root", "root");
                string ErrMsg1 = string.Empty;
                bool rtn = GlobalVariable.mysql.Connect(out ErrMsg1);
                if (!rtn)
                {
                    MachineException.CallException(ExceptionType.NormalInfo, this._description, "数据库连接失败");
                    ErrMsg = "数据库连接失败";
                    return false;
                }
                else
                {
                    goto re;
                }
            }
            else
            {
                QueryHelper queryHelper = new QueryHelper();
                queryHelper.tableName = GlobalVariable.CurrentSystemConfig.PG110MES前站表名;

                queryHelper.L_SelectClounmName = new List<string>();
                queryHelper.L_SelectClounmName.Add("HK7");

                queryHelper.L_SelectItem = new List<SelectItem>();
                queryHelper.L_SelectItem.Add(new SelectItem("S/N", SelectRegion.等于, code));
                string msg = string.Empty;
                List<string> result = new List<string>();
                bool rtn = GlobalVariable.mysql.Query(queryHelper, out result, ref msg);
                if (!rtn)
                {
                    ErrMsg = "数据库查询异常";
                    return false;
                }

                if (result.Count == 0)
                {
                    ErrMsg = "前站未检测";
                    return false;
                }
                else
                {
                    if (result[result.Count - 1] == "false")
                    {
                        ErrMsg = "前站未烘烤";
                        return false;
                    }
                    else
                    {
                        ErrMsg = string.Empty;
                        return true;
                    }

                }
            }
        }
        else
        {
            ErrMsg = string.Empty;
            return true;
        }
    }
    catch (Exception ex)
    {
        ErrMsg = ex.ToString();
        return false;
    }
}

 public class zihuiFlow : Flow
 {
     private Axis _axis;
     public FormMain _formMain;
     private FormUserUI _userForm;
     private FormProgram _programForm;
     private FormNewVision _newVision;
     private Stopwatch sw = new Stopwatch();

     // colorCheck.Add("Red", "R:235-255 G:0-35 B:0-35");
     private static Dictionary<string, string> colorCheck = new Dictionary<string, string>()
     {
         { "Red", "235-255 0-35 0-35"},
         {"Green", "0-35 235-255 0-35"},
          {"Blue", "0-35 0-35 235-255"},
          {"White", "235-255 235-255 235-255"},
          { "Black", "0-35 0-35 0-35" }
     };

     public static string[] resultsJobstring = new string[] { "Black", "Red", "Green", "Blue" , "White"};
     //#region Property
     //private string _ProCode = "";
     //private List<Axis> Axislist = new List<Axis> { GlobalVariable.cardControl._axis_X轴, GlobalVariable.cardControl._axis_Y轴 };
     //private List<double> zeroList = new List<double> { 0,0 };
     //public double _value;
     //public List<object> L_result = new List<object>();
     //#endregion
     public zihuiFlow(FormUserUI userForm, FormProgram programForm)
     {
         _userForm = userForm;
         _programForm = programForm;
     }

     public bool testResult = false;//测试结果
     public double result = 0;//测试值
     public List<Object> L_resultContent = new List<Object>();


     public override bool Init()
     {

         _statusCount = 0;
         return true;

     }
     #region Method
 
     public override void flowMethod()
     {
      
         try
         {
             while (true)
             {
                 Init:
                 if (_statusCount == 0)
                 {
                   
                     Job job = Job.FindJobByName(GlobalVariable.CurrentProgramConfig.视觉流程);
                     if (job == null)
                     {
                         MachineException.CallException(ExceptionType.NormalErr, "视觉流程", "未获得视觉流程");
                         CheckFlowCondition();
                         goto Init;
                     }

                     //job.BindImageWindow(this._userForm.newImage._display[0]); // 显示到界面
                     //job.ShowInterval = 6;
                     this._userForm.newImage._display[0].HobjectToHimage(job.GetCurrentImage(), true);
                     HObject image = job.GetCurrentImage();
                     List<object> L_result = job.Run();

                     if (L_result.Count == 5) {

                         for (int i = 0; i < L_result.Count; i++) {
                             HObject imageresult = L_result[i] as HObject;
                             bool stRGB = false;
                             if (imageresult != null) {
                                 string st;
                                 colorCheck.TryGetValue(resultsJobstring[i], out st);


                                 string[] arr = st.Split(' ');

                                 int rmin = int.Parse(arr[0].Split('-')[0]);
                                 int rmax = int.Parse(arr[0].Split('-')[1]);
                                 int gmin = int.Parse(arr[1].Split('-')[0]);
                                 int gmax = int.Parse(arr[1].Split('-')[1]);
                                 int bmin = int.Parse(arr[2].Split('-')[0]);
                                 int bmax = int.Parse(arr[2].Split('-')[1]);
                                 stRGB = CheckRGB(imageresult, rmin, rmax, gmin, gmax, bmin, bmax);
                             }
                             MachineException.CallException(ExceptionType.FatalErr, "判断结果" + resultsJobstring[i], stRGB.ToString());
                             this._userForm.newImage._display[i + 1].HobjectToHimage(imageresult, true);
                         }
                     }

                     //this.formUserUI.newImage._display[0].HobjectToHimage(image, true);

                     _statusCount = 1;
                 }
                 if (_statusCount == 1)
                 {
                     Thread.Sleep(2000);
                     _statusCount = 0;
                     goto Init;
                 }
                 Thread.Sleep(10);
             }
         }
         catch (Exception ex)
         {
             MachineException.CallException(ExceptionType.NormalErr, "警告", "测试线程异常,请复位后再测试:" + ex.ToString());

         }

     }
     #endregion

     


     public bool CheckRGB(HObject image,int rMin, int rMax, int gMin, int gMax, int bMin, int bMax)
     {


         HObject red = null, green = null, blue = null;
         HObject redRegion = null, greenRegion = null, blueRegion = null;
         HObject tempRegion = null, validRegion = null;

         try
         {

             // 2. 检查是否为三通道图像
             HTuple channels;
             HOperatorSet.CountChannels(image, out channels);
             if (channels.I != 3)
                 throw new Exception("错误：图像不是RGB三通道格式！");

             // 3. 分解RGB通道
             HOperatorSet.Decompose3(image, out red, out green, out blue);

             // 4. 对各通道进行阈值分割
             HOperatorSet.Threshold(red, out redRegion, rMin, rMax);
             HOperatorSet.Threshold(green, out greenRegion, gMin, gMax);
             HOperatorSet.Threshold(blue, out blueRegion, bMin, bMax);

             // 5. 计算三个通道的交集
             HOperatorSet.Intersection(redRegion, greenRegion, out tempRegion);
             HOperatorSet.Intersection(tempRegion, blueRegion, out validRegion);

             // 6. 计算有效区域像素数
             HTuple areaValid, row, col;
             HOperatorSet.AreaCenter(validRegion, out areaValid, out row, out col);

             // 7. 获取总像素数
             HTuple width, height;
             HOperatorSet.GetImageSize(image, out width, out height);
             long totalPixels = width * height;

             // 8. 判断结果
             if (areaValid.L == totalPixels)
             {
                 return true;
             }
             else
             {
                 double ratio = (double)areaValid.D / totalPixels * 100;
                 return false;
             }
         }
         catch (HalconException hex)
         {
             Console.WriteLine($"Halcon异常: {hex.Message}");
             return false;
         }
         finally
         {
             // 释放所有Halcon对象
             red.Dispose();
             green.Dispose();
             blue.Dispose();
             redRegion.Dispose();
             greenRegion.Dispose();
             blueRegion.Dispose();
             tempRegion.Dispose();
             validRegion.Dispose();
         }
     }


 }

// 判断一张图片的RGB 是不是在范围内

public bool CheckRGB(HObject image,int rMin, int rMax, int gMin, int gMax, int bMin, int bMax)
     {


         HObject red = null, green = null, blue = null;
         HObject redRegion = null, greenRegion = null, blueRegion = null;
         HObject tempRegion = null, validRegion = null;

         try
         {

             // 2. 检查是否为三通道图像
             HTuple channels;
             HOperatorSet.CountChannels(image, out channels);
             if (channels.I != 3)
                 throw new Exception("错误：图像不是RGB三通道格式！");

             // 3. 分解RGB通道
             HOperatorSet.Decompose3(image, out red, out green, out blue);

             // 4. 对各通道进行阈值分割
             HOperatorSet.Threshold(red, out redRegion, rMin, rMax);
             HOperatorSet.Threshold(green, out greenRegion, gMin, gMax);
             HOperatorSet.Threshold(blue, out blueRegion, bMin, bMax);

             // 5. 计算三个通道的交集
             HOperatorSet.Intersection(redRegion, greenRegion, out tempRegion);
             HOperatorSet.Intersection(tempRegion, blueRegion, out validRegion);

             // 6. 计算有效区域像素数
             HTuple areaValid, row, col;
             HOperatorSet.AreaCenter(validRegion, out areaValid, out row, out col);

             // 7. 获取总像素数
             HTuple width, height;
             HOperatorSet.GetImageSize(image, out width, out height);
             long totalPixels = width * height;

             // 8. 判断结果
             if (areaValid.L == totalPixels)
             {
                 return true;
             }
             else
             {
                 double ratio = (double)areaValid.D / totalPixels * 100;
                 return false;
             }
         }
         catch (HalconException hex)
         {
             Console.WriteLine($"Halcon异常: {hex.Message}");
             return false;
         }
         finally
         {
             // 释放所有Halcon对象
             red.Dispose();
             green.Dispose();
             blue.Dispose();
             redRegion.Dispose();
             greenRegion.Dispose();
             blueRegion.Dispose();
             tempRegion.Dispose();
             validRegion.Dispose();
         }
     }

List<ICogGraphic> list = new List<ICogGraphic>();
AddLabel(x, y, dis.ToString("0.00"), false, fl2.InputImage.SelectedSpaceName);
 
public void  AddLabel(double x, double y, string text, bool Re, string sapcename)
  {
    CogGraphicLabel label = new CogGraphicLabel();
    label.SetXYText(x, y, text);
    label.Color = Re ? CogColorConstants.Green : CogColorConstants.Red;
    label.Rotation = CogMisc.DegToRad(0);
    label.Alignment = CogGraphicLabelAlignmentConstants.BottomLeft;
    label.SelectedSpaceName = sapcename;
    label.Font = new Font("微软雅黑", 10);
    list.Add(label);
  }


  #region When the Last Run Record is Created
  /// <summary>
  /// Called when the last run record may have changed and is being reconstructed
  /// </summary>
  /// <param name="lastRecord">
  /// The new last run record is available to be initialized or customized.</param>
  public override void ModifyLastRunRecord(Cognex.VisionPro.ICogRecord lastRecord)
  {
    
    foreach ( var item in list)
    {
      mToolBlock.AddGraphicToRunRecord(item, lastRecord, lastRecord.SubRecords[0].RecordKey, "");
    }
  }
  #endregion

public void SaveCsv1(float weight_value, string StartTime, string path)
  {
      string Data = string.Empty;
      Data += weight_value + ",";
      Data += StartTime;
      if (!Directory.Exists(path))
      {
          Directory.CreateDirectory(path);
      }
      string filepath = path + "\\" + DateTime.Now.ToString("yyyyMMdd") + ".csv";
      if (!File.Exists(filepath))
      {
          File.Create(filepath).Dispose();
          using (StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(filepath, true))
          {
              sw.WriteLine("Weight" + "," + "Time"); // 第一行
              sw.Close();
          }
      }
      using (StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(filepath, true))
      {
          sw.WriteLine(Data); // 内容
          sw.Close();
      }
  }






CSV1(DateTime.Now.ToString("HH:mm:ss") + "," + Data_Str1 + l, @"E:\\Data\\Cam1\\第一段\\Up_Data");

  #region 保存数据1
  string Data_Name1;
  public void CSV1(string Data, string path)
  {
    int Long_Caliper_Count = (int) mToolBlock.Inputs["Long_Caliper_Count"].Value;
    //int Short_Caliper_Count = (int) mToolBlock.Inputs["Short_Caliper_Count"].Value;
    if (!Directory.Exists(path))
    {
      Directory.CreateDirectory(path);
    }
    string filepath = path + "\\" + DateTime.Now.ToString("yyyyMMdd") + ".csv";
    if (!File.Exists(filepath))
    {
      File.Create(filepath).Dispose();
      using (StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(filepath, true))
      {
        for (int i = 0; i < Long_Caliper_Count; i++)
        {
          Data_Name1 += "Distance" + (i + 1) + ",";
         
        }
        sw.WriteLine("Time," + Data_Name1 + ",Result");
        sw.Close();
      }
    }
    using (StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(filepath, true))
    {
      sw.WriteLine(Data);
      sw.Close();
    } 
  }
  #endregion

 //冒泡排序

    CogPMAlignResult t_PMAlignResult;

    for (int i = 0; i < t_PMAlignTool1.Results.Count; i++)
    {
      for (int j = i + 1; j < t_PMAlignTool1.Results.Count; j++)
      {
        if (t_PMAlignResults[j].Score > t_PMAlignResults[i].Score)
        {
          t_PMAlignResult = t_PMAlignResults[i];
          t_PMAlignResults[i] = t_PMAlignResults[j];
          t_PMAlignResults[j] = t_PMAlignResult;
        }
      }
    }

// 判断一张图片的RGB 是不是在范围内
public bool CheckRGB(HObject image,int rMin, int rMax, int gMin, int gMax, int bMin, int bMax)
     {


         HObject red = null, green = null, blue = null;
         HObject redRegion = null, greenRegion = null, blueRegion = null;
         HObject tempRegion = null, validRegion = null;

         try
         {

             // 2. 检查是否为三通道图像
             HTuple channels;
             HOperatorSet.CountChannels(image, out channels);
             if (channels.I != 3)
                 throw new Exception("错误：图像不是RGB三通道格式！");

             // 3. 分解RGB通道
             HOperatorSet.Decompose3(image, out red, out green, out blue);

             // 4. 对各通道进行阈值分割
             HOperatorSet.Threshold(red, out redRegion, rMin, rMax);
             HOperatorSet.Threshold(green, out greenRegion, gMin, gMax);
             HOperatorSet.Threshold(blue, out blueRegion, bMin, bMax);

             // 5. 计算三个通道的交集
             HOperatorSet.Intersection(redRegion, greenRegion, out tempRegion);
             HOperatorSet.Intersection(tempRegion, blueRegion, out validRegion);

             // 6. 计算有效区域像素数
             HTuple areaValid, row, col;
             HOperatorSet.AreaCenter(validRegion, out areaValid, out row, out col);

             // 7. 获取总像素数
             HTuple width, height;
             HOperatorSet.GetImageSize(image, out width, out height);
             long totalPixels = width * height;

             // 8. 判断结果
             if (areaValid.L == totalPixels)
             {
                 return true;
             }
             else
             {
                 double ratio = (double)areaValid.D / totalPixels * 100;
                 return false;
             }
         }
         catch (HalconException hex)
         {
             Console.WriteLine($"Halcon异常: {hex.Message}");
             return false;
         }
         finally
         {
             // 释放所有Halcon对象
             red.Dispose();
             green.Dispose();
             blue.Dispose();
             redRegion.Dispose();
             greenRegion.Dispose();
             blueRegion.Dispose();
             tempRegion.Dispose();
             validRegion.Dispose();
         }
     }

 public void sendMsg(string msg)
 {
     if (serialPort.IsOpen)
     {
         byte[] data = HexStringToByteArray(msg);
         serialPort.Write(data, 0, data.Length);      
         string s = string.Empty;
         for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i ++)
         {
             s += data[i].ToString();
         }
        // MachineException.CallException(ExceptionType.NormalInfo, "data", s);
     }
     else
     {
         MessageBox.Show("串口未打开");
     }
 }
 public static byte[] HexStringToByteArray(string hex)
 {
     int length = hex.Length;
     if (length % 2 != 0)
     {
         throw new ArgumentException("十六进制字符串长度必须为偶数。");
     }
     byte[] bytes = new byte[length / 2];
     for (int i = 0; i < length; i += 2)
     {
         string hexPair = hex.Substring(i, 2);
         bytes[i / 2] = Convert.ToByte(hexPair, 16);
     }
     return bytes;
 }

 string _Data = string.Empty;
public void ReciveMsg(object sender, SerialDataReceivedEventArgs e)
 {
     SerialPort sp = (SerialPort)sender;

     // 读取字节数据
     int bytesToRead = sp.BytesToRead;
     byte[] buffer = new byte[bytesToRead];
     sp.Read(buffer, 0, bytesToRead);

     string hexData = BitConverter.ToString(buffer).Replace("-", "");
     //010304024E00009B9C
     
     _Data += hexData;
     MachineException.CallException(ExceptionType.NormalInfo, "SerialPort Received Bytes", _Data);
    
     // 检测结束符
     if (_Data.StartsWith("0103") && _Data.Length == 18)  // 根据需要变
     {
         MachineException.CallException(ExceptionType.NormalInfo, "_Data.EndsWith(\"0103\") && _Data.Length == 18", _Data);
         GlobalVariable.eReciveData = _Data;
         string show = _Data;
         _Data = string.Empty;
     }
   
 }

public void ReciveMsg(object sender, SerialDataReceivedEventArgs e)
{
    SerialPort sp = (SerialPort)sender;
    string data = sp.ReadExisting(); //读取收到的数据
    _Data += data;
    MachineException.CallException(ExceptionType.NormalInfo, "SerialPort sp.ReadExisting()", _Data);
    if (_Data.EndsWith("\r\n"))
    {
        GlobalVariable.eReciveData = _Data;
        string show = data;
        //if (formProductMessage != null)

}



public void ReciveMsg(object sender, SerialDataReceivedEventArgs e)
 {
     SerialPort sp = (SerialPort)sender;
     string data = sp.ReadExisting(); //读取收到的数据
     _eData += data;
     if (_eData.EndsWith("\r\n"))
     {
         GlobalVariable.eReciveData = _电流Data;
         if (GlobalVariable.isShow)
             this.ProgramForm.formDebug.rtb_Recived.AppendText(_eData);
         _eData = string.Empty;
     }

     if (GlobalVariable.isShow)
         this.ProgramForm.formDebug.rtb_Recived.AppendText(data);
     //listReciveDate.Add(date);
     //Console.WriteLine(date);
 }

using NBVision.Shared;
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.IO.Ports;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using System.Windows.Forms;
using NBVision.UI.UserUI;
using Nobug2.Vision;
using Nobug;
namespace NBVision.Flow
{
    public class PortCommunication
    {
        public Action<string> laserMsgDisplay;
        public string Description;
        public SerialPort serialPort;
        public Action<string> myAction;
        public string Port { get; set; }

        public FormProductMessage formProduct;


        public List<string> listReciveDate = new List<string>();

        public string _hex_order = "AA";  // 通讯命令


        public bool isSignal = false;  // 默认无信号
        public PortCommunication(string description, string port = "COM5", int baudRate = 9600, Parity parity = Parity.Even, int dataBits = 8, StopBits stopBits = StopBits.One)
        {
            this.Description = description;
            this.Port = port;
            serialPort = new SerialPort();
            serialPort.PortName = port;
            serialPort.BaudRate = baudRate;
            serialPort.Parity = parity;
            serialPort.DataBits = dataBits;
            serialPort.StopBits = stopBits;
            serialPort.ReadTimeout = 2000;

            //serialPort.DataReceived += ReciveMsg; // 全局里面
        }
        public bool Open()
        {
            try
            {
                if (serialPort != null)
                {
                    if (!serialPort.IsOpen)
                    {
                        serialPort.Open();
                    }
                }
                return true;
            }
            catch (Exception ex)
            {
                //  MachineException.CallException(ExceptionType.NormalErr, "", ex.Message);
                MessageBox.Show("测试仪器" + ex.Message);
                return false;
            }
        }
        public void CloseComPort()
        {
            if (serialPort != null)
            {
                if (serialPort.IsOpen)
                {
                    serialPort.Close();
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

 #region xml 保存路径 
  private string xmlSavePath = @"D:\\Config.xml";
  [Category("XML保存路径")]
  public string _xmlSavePath
  {
      get { return xmlSavePath; }
      set { xmlSavePath = value; }
  }
  #endregion 


public void Load()
  {
      try
      {
          Dictionary<string, string> dic = SerializeXmlSwitch.JsonDeserialize<Dictionary<string, string>>(SerializeXmlSwitch.DeserializeFromXml<String>(xmlSavePath));
          codePort = dic["port"];

      }
      catch (Exception ex)
      {
          return;
      }

  }
  // 将值保存到指定文件内
  public void Save(Dictionary<string, string> data)
  {
      
      if (!File.Exists(xmlSavePath))
      {
          File.Create(xmlSavePath).Dispose();
      }
      SerializeXmlSwitch.SerializeToXml(xmlSavePath, SerializeXmlSwitch.JsonSerializer(data));
  }

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.IO;
using System.Linq;
using System.Runtime.Serialization.Json;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using System.Xml.Serialization;

namespace WeightProject.Config
{
    public class SerializeXmlSwitch
    {
        /// <summary>
        /// JSON序列化
        /// </summary>
        public static string JsonSerializer<T>(T t)
        {
            var ser = new DataContractJsonSerializer(typeof(T));
            var ms = new MemoryStream();
            ser.WriteObject(ms, t);
            string jsonString = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(ms.ToArray());
            ms.Close();
            return jsonString;
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// JSON反序列化
        /// </summary>
        public static T JsonDeserialize<T>(string jsonString)
        {
            var ser = new DataContractJsonSerializer(typeof(T));
            var ms = new MemoryStream(Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(jsonString));
            var obj = (T)ser.ReadObject(ms);
            return obj;
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// XML序列化某一类型到指定的文件
        /// </summary>
        /// <param name="filePath"></param>
        /// <param name="obj"></param>
        /// <param name="type"></param>
        public static void SerializeToXml<T>(string filePath, T obj)
        {
            try
            {
                using (System.IO.StreamWriter writer = new System.IO.StreamWriter(filePath))
                {
                    System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer xs = new System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer(typeof(T));
                    xs.Serialize(writer, obj);
                }
            }
            catch (Exception ex)
            {
                Console.WriteLine(ex.ToString());
            }
        }

        public static T DeserializeFile<T>(string filePath, string xmlRootName = "Root")
        {
            T result = default(T);
            if (File.Exists(filePath))
            {
                using (StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(filePath))
                {
                    XmlSerializer xmlSerializer = string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(xmlRootName) ?
                        new XmlSerializer(typeof(T)) : new XmlSerializer(typeof(T), new XmlRootAttribute(xmlRootName));
                    result = (T)xmlSerializer.Deserialize(reader);
                }
            }
            return result;
        }
        /// <summary>
        /// 从某一XML文件反序列化到某一类型
        /// </summary>
        /// <param name="filePath">待反序列化的XML文件名称</param>
        /// <param name="type">反序列化出的</param>
        /// <returns></returns>
        public static T DeserializeFromXml<T>(string filePath)
        {
            try
            {
                if (!System.IO.File.Exists(filePath))
                    throw new ArgumentNullException(filePath + " not Exists");

                using (System.IO.StreamReader reader = new System.IO.StreamReader(filePath))
                {
                    System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer xs = new System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer(typeof(T));
                    T ret = (T)xs.Deserialize(reader);
                    return ret;
                }
            }
            catch (Exception ex)
            {
                Console.WriteLine(ex.ToString());
                return default(T);
            }
        }

        public static string XmlSerialize<T>(T obj)
        {
            using (StringWriter sw = new StringWriter())
            {
                Type t = obj.GetType();
                XmlSerializer serializer = new XmlSerializer(obj.GetType(), "utf-16");
                serializer.Serialize(sw, obj);
                sw.Close();
                return sw.ToString();
            }
        }
        public static T DESerializer<T>(string strXML) where T : class
        {
            try
            {
                using (StringReader sr = new StringReader(strXML))
                {
                    XmlSerializer serializer = new XmlSerializer(typeof(T));
                    return serializer.Deserialize(sr) as T;
                }
            }
            catch (Exception ex)
            {
                return null;
            }
        }
    }

}

item.title: C#异步BeginInoke
item.description:
1
2
3
4
5
6
7
8

this.Invoke()的作用与用法、不阻塞UI界面线程的延时函数
Invoke 与begininvoke区别在于，invoke会阻塞当前线程，直到invoke调用结束，才会继续执行下去，而begininvoke 则可以异步进行调用，也就是该方法封送完毕后马上返回，不会等待委托方法的执行结束，调用者线程将不会被阻塞。但是调用者也可以使用EndInvoke方法或者其它类似
WaitHandle机制等待异步操作的完成。

如果你的后台线程在更新一个UI控件的状态后不需要等待，而是要继续往下处理，那么你就应该使用BeginInvoke来进行异步处理。

如果你的后台线程需要操作UI控件，并且需要等到该操作执行完毕才能继续执行，那么你就应该使用Invoke。
EventHandler即事件委托，表示用于处理不具有事件数据的事件的方法。

代码：

this._formMain.UserUIForm.formProductMessage.BeginInvoke(new Action(() =>
{

    this._formMain.UserUIForm.formProductMessage.lb_90_2Code.Text = _programDate.Load;
    this._formMain.UserUIForm.formProductMessage.lb_90_2Code2.Text = _programDate.UnLoad;
    this._formMain.UserUIForm.formProductMessage.lb_90_2CodeResult.Text = "1";
    this._formMain.UserUIForm.formProductMessage.lb_90_2CodeResult2.Text = "1";
}));



 this.BeginInvoke(new Action(() =>
  {
      this.weight_label.Text = s;  
  }));
   this.formMain.UserUIForm.BeginInvoke(new Action(() =>
 {
     formMain.UserUIForm.formProductMessage.btn_status.Text = "相机处理中...";
     formMain.UserUIForm.formProductMessage.btn_status.BackColor = System.Drawing.Color.White;
 }));

 public void SaveCsv1(float weight_value, string StartTime, string path)
  {
      string Data = string.Empty;
      Data += weight_value + ",";
      Data += StartTime;
      if (!Directory.Exists(path))
      {
          Directory.CreateDirectory(path);
      }
      string filepath = path + "\\" + DateTime.Now.ToString("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss") + ".csv";
      if (!File.Exists(filepath))
      {
          File.Create(filepath).Dispose();
          using (StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(filepath, true))
          {
              sw.WriteLine("Weight" + "," + "Time"); // 第一行
              sw.Close();
          }
      }
      using (StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(filepath, true)) // 追加数据
      {
          sw.WriteLine(Data); // 内容
          sw.Close();
      }
       //using (StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(filepath, false)) // 不追加数据
 //{
 //    sw.WriteLine(Data);
 //    sw.Close();
 //}
      
  }

  #region 保存数据1
  string Data_Name1;
  public void CSV1(string Data, string path)
  {
    int Long_Caliper_Count = (int) mToolBlock.Inputs["Long_Caliper_Count"].Value;
    //int Short_Caliper_Count = (int) mToolBlock.Inputs["Short_Caliper_Count"].Value;
    if (!Directory.Exists(path))
    {
      Directory.CreateDirectory(path);
    }
    string filepath = path + "\\" + DateTime.Now.ToString("yyyyMMdd") + ".csv";
    if (!File.Exists(filepath))
    {
      File.Create(filepath).Dispose();
      using (StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(filepath, true))
      {
        for (int i = 0; i < Long_Caliper_Count; i++)
        {
          Data_Name1 += "Distance" + (i + 1) + ",";
         
        }
        sw.WriteLine("Time," + Data_Name1 + ",Result");
        sw.Close();
      }
    }
    using (StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(filepath, true))
    {
      sw.WriteLine(Data);
      sw.Close();
    } 
  }
  #endregion
